<title level="1" right="Rules">[Lava Bombs](/Rules.aspx?ID=660)</title>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 519 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">
Pressure can launch lava into the air that falls as lava bombs: masses of lava that solidify as they fly and shatter on impact, dealing at least moderate bludgeoning damage and moderate fire damage.
</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
